channel.title: [Delta] [317] How To Change IP from Client [317] [Delta]
channel.description:
Lol got so noob problem xD I have made webclient and coded some of client but don't know how to change Ip from it :S
My folder pics : [img]http://suomeksipr0.webs.com/RSPS/Kuvat/first%201.bmp[/img]
[img]http://suomeksipr0.webs.com/RSPS/Kuvat/first%202.bmp[/img]
I have changed Ip from Source right
I changed the Ip from Gui.Java [img]http://suomeksipr0.webs.com/RSPS/Kuvat/gui.bmp[/img]
i didin't find anything in client.java and ports are same.
Help please when my friends test to log in it says Error connecting to server :S please help...
